title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 30 May 2009 - XWiki
content:
anamarias left at 00:08 () jvdrean joined #xwiki at 00:20 jvdrean left at 00:20 (Client Quit) arkub left at 00:26 (Read error: 60 (Operation timed out)) rrodriguez left at 00:40 () jk\_work joined #xwiki at 00:52 tharindu\_ joined #xwiki at 02:58 tharindu left at 02:59 (Read error: 110 (Connection timed out)) arunreddy joined #xwiki at 04:18 tharindu\_ left at 04:28 (Read error: 60 (Operation timed out)) tharindu\_ joined #xwiki at 04:36 tharindu\_\_ joined #xwiki at 05:11 tharindu\_ left at 05:13 (Read error: 110 (Connection timed out)) jvelociter left at 08:06 () vmassol joined #xwiki at 08:51 asyd - (30/05/2009 09:10): hello there rrodriguez joined #xwiki at 09:10 vmassol left at 09:27 () vmassol joined #xwiki at 09:50 rrodriguez\_ joined #xwiki at 09:52 rrodriguez left at 09:52 (Read error: 104 (Connection reset by peer)) arunreddy left at 09:52 (Read error: 104 (Connection reset by peer)) arunreddy joined #xwiki at 09:53 rrodriguez\_ left at 09:55 (Client Quit) kaaloo joined #xwiki at 09:57 jvelociter joined #xwiki at 10:03 tharindu\_\_ left at 10:11 ("Leaving") rrodriguez joined #xwiki at 10:34 rrodriguez left at 10:53 () anamarias joined #xwiki at 11:18 arunreddy\_ joined #xwiki at 11:56 lucaa joined #xwiki at 12:14 arunreddy left at 12:17 (Read error: 113 (No route to host)) tharindu joined #xwiki at 12:24 marta\_ joined #xwiki at 12:34 arunreddy\_ - (30/05/2009 12:52): vmassol : Hi arunreddy\_ - (30/05/2009 12:53): If i pass http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:Search?go=Go&search=WebHome as input to XWiki 2.0 Syntax Parser arunreddy\_ - (30/05/2009 12:53): [ [ WebHome] ] vmassol left at 12:55 () arunreddy\_ - (30/05/2009 12:55): what is the expected xhtml output  

WebHome

or

WebHome

vmassol joined #xwiki at 13:26 vmassol left at 13:29 (Client Quit) marta\_ - (30/05/2009 13:40): hi arunreddy\_ marta\_ - (30/05/2009 13:40): the question you asked an hour ago is not very clear... marta\_ - (30/05/2009 13:41): could you please explain what you mean? arunreddy\_ - (30/05/2009 13:49): sure vmassol joined #xwiki at 13:49 arunreddy\_ - (30/05/2009 13:50): marta\_: Hi arunreddy\_ - (30/05/2009 13:50): http://xwiki.pastebin.com/m1eca4c6d arunreddy\_ - (30/05/2009 13:50): Kindly check the link. tharindu left at 13:51 (Read error: 110 (Connection timed out)) arunreddy\_ - (30/05/2009 13:51): [ [WebHome] ] arunreddy\_ - (30/05/2009 13:52): according to XWiki 2.0 Syntax is the link to /xwiki/bin/view/Main/ tharindu joined #xwiki at 13:53 sdumitriu joined #xwiki at 13:54 sdumitriu - (30/05/2009 13:54): arunreddy\_: It should be a link sdumitriu - (30/05/2009 13:54): Where did you get that from? arunreddy\_ - (30/05/2009 13:54): in XHtml it should be

WebHome

but the Test is passing for arunreddy\_ - (30/05/2009 13:54):

WebHome

arunreddy\_ - (30/05/2009 13:55): Hi arunreddy\_ - (30/05/2009 13:55): sdumitriu: Hi arunreddy\_ - (30/05/2009 13:56): Its an existing test in platform/core/xwiki-rendering/xwiki-rendering-standalone/ arunreddy\_ - (30/05/2009 13:57): ExampleTest.java arunreddy\_ - (30/05/2009 13:58): Actually it checks the bold text "This is \*\*bold\*\* " arunreddy\_ - (30/05/2009 13:59): I have changed and testing for various things.. links, Tables, Lists and so on. arunreddy\_ - (30/05/2009 14:04): marta\_ : Is it clear. ? sdumitriu - (30/05/2009 14:05): Yes, but I don't know why it's like that sdumitriu - (30/05/2009 14:06): Ah, I think I know sdumitriu - (30/05/2009 14:06): The standalone package does not depend on the wiki sdumitriu - (30/05/2009 14:07): But links like that are bound to the wiki, since they have to: sdumitriu - (30/05/2009 14:07): - check if the document exists or not sdumitriu - (30/05/2009 14:07): - generate the right URL according to the wiki settings sdumitriu - (30/05/2009 14:07): So it's normal that it doesn't work sdumitriu - (30/05/2009 14:07): Try a HTTP link arunreddy\_ - (30/05/2009 14:07): yes http links do work kaaloo left at 14:08 ("Leaving.") kaaloo joined #xwiki at 14:08 kaaloo left at 14:09 (Client Quit) arunreddy\_ - (30/05/2009 14:09): SO the links are  generated at runtime.. ? sdumitriu - (30/05/2009 14:09): Yes sdumitriu - (30/05/2009 14:09): news arunreddy\_ - (30/05/2009 14:10): sdumitriu : Thanks :) sdumitriu - (30/05/2009 14:38): vmassol: Ping anamarias left at 15:36 () tharindu left at 16:04 (Read error: 60 (Operation timed out)) florinciu joined #xwiki at 16:37 rahul joined #xwiki at 16:42 cristinas joined #xwiki at 18:11 rahul left at 18:22 ("Leaving") arkub joined #xwiki at 18:45 arunreddy joined #xwiki at 18:52 arkub left at 18:53 (Read error: 60 (Operation timed out)) vmassol - (30/05/2009 18:55): sdumitriu: pong vmassol - (30/05/2009 18:56): (not here for long) vmassol - (30/05/2009 18:56): brb sdumitriu - (30/05/2009 18:57): About http://jira.xwiki.org/jira/browse/XWIKI-3926 arunreddy\_ left at 19:05 (No route to host) lucaa left at 19:06 (Remote closed the connection) vmassol - (30/05/2009 19:18): sdumitriu: yes? haven't thought too much but for 1) we need to be able to get the xwiki encoding from the rendering module (in XWikiWikiModel) sdumitriu - (30/05/2009 19:19): We can assume it's UTF8 for the moment sdumitriu - (30/05/2009 19:19): It's a step forward already kaaloo joined #xwiki at 19:46 vmassol left at 20:22 () anamarias joined #xwiki at 20:46 florinciu\_ joined #xwiki at 21:40 florinciu\_\_ joined #xwiki at 21:45 florinciu\_\_ left at 21:49 (Client Quit) lucaa joined #xwiki at 21:49 florinciu left at 21:51 (Read error: 110 (Connection timed out)) florinciu\_ left at 22:03 (Read error: 110 (Connection timed out)) cristinas - (30/05/2009 22:39): hi! sdumitriu - (30/05/2009 22:40): Hi cristinas cristinas - (30/05/2009 22:42): sdumitriu.. I have a problem.. I build my extension successful, but when I run it and I use XWikiRpcClient it throws me an exception: NoClassDefFound .. because I don't put in my extension the jar with the XmlRpcClient .. sdumitriu - (30/05/2009 22:43): It should be included sdumitriu - (30/05/2009 22:43): The extension can have more than one jar, right? cristinas - (30/05/2009 22:43): which library should I add in my archive and how can I tell maven the classpath cristinas - (30/05/2009 22:43): yes cristinas - (30/05/2009 22:44): it can have as many as I want sdumitriu - (30/05/2009 22:44): If the code depends on it, then it should be declared as a maven dependency cristinas - (30/05/2009 22:44): well I've declared as maven depency , and that's why it builds successfully sdumitriu - (30/05/2009 22:45): Yes cristinas - (30/05/2009 22:45): but in the whole archive maven doesn't put this jar sdumitriu - (30/05/2009 22:45): After that, you must edit the assembly to also include that jar sdumitriu - (30/05/2009 22:46): src/main/assembly/dep.xml cristinas - (30/05/2009 22:46): can I tell the assembly plugin to put the jar from a dependency, or I have to download the jar cristinas - (30/05/2009 22:46): and tell explicit? sdumitriu - (30/05/2009 22:47): You must add a dependencySets element cristinas - (30/05/2009 22:48): ok, thanks a lot sdumitriu - (30/05/2009 22:48): http://maven.apache.org/plugins/maven-assembly-plugin/assembly.html#class\_dependencySet sdumitriu - (30/05/2009 22:48): Play with the includes/excludes so that the OO jars don't get included cristinas - (30/05/2009 22:49): ok, i will try sdumitriu - (30/05/2009 22:49): Here are some examples: http://maven.apache.org/plugins/maven-assembly-plugin/examples/index.html sdumitriu - (30/05/2009 22:49): This is what you need: http://maven.apache.org/plugins/maven-assembly-plugin/examples/single/including-and-excluding-artifacts.html cristinas - (30/05/2009 22:51): thanks a lot lucaa left at 23:02 ("Leaving.") cristinas - (30/05/2009 23:03): I've added this code : cristinas - (30/05/2009 23:03): cristinas - (30/05/2009 23:03):            cristinas - (30/05/2009 23:03):        cristinas - (30/05/2009 23:03):         xwiki-core-xmlrpc-client cristinas - (30/05/2009 23:03):        cristinas - (30/05/2009 23:03):      cristinas - (30/05/2009 23:03):    cristinas - (30/05/2009 23:03): and nothing happend cristinas - (30/05/2009 23:04): I get also a warning cristinas - (30/05/2009 23:04): [WARNING] The following patterns were never triggered in this artifact inclusion filter: cristinas - (30/05/2009 23:04): o  'xwiki-core-xmlrpc-client' lucaa joined #xwiki at 23:06 sdumitriu - (30/05/2009 23:14): It should be: sdumitriu - (30/05/2009 23:14): org.xwiki.platform:xwiki-core-xmlrpc-client sdumitriu - (30/05/2009 23:14): Try it cristinas - (30/05/2009 23:15): ok thanks, I try it now cristinas - (30/05/2009 23:17): the warning doesn't appear any more .. but the archive seems to be the same .. I try to install it in ooo cristinas - (30/05/2009 23:20): it works now .. but it doesn't find the dependcies from the XWikiRpcClient cristinas - (30/05/2009 23:20): like confluence cristinas - (30/05/2009 23:22): it there a specify that a dependency must be recursive included? arunreddy left at 23:25 (Read error: 54 (Connection reset by peer)) arunreddy joined #xwiki at 23:25 sdumitriu - (30/05/2009 23:36): Well, for the moment try removing the element tachirei joined #xwiki at 23:36 cristinas - (30/05/2009 23:36): ok cristinas - (30/05/2009 23:37): you mean the and all its children? sdumitriu - (30/05/2009 23:37): Yes sdumitriu - (30/05/2009 23:38): By default it means that all dependencies are included cristinas - (30/05/2009 23:40): It works!! cristinas - (30/05/2009 23:40): thank you very much tachirei left #xwiki at 23:45 sdumitriu - (30/05/2009 23:49): You're welcome tachirei joined #xwiki at 23:52 tachirei left #xwiki at 23:53
